rows.label: qev092204_MSG0001
rows.name: Cauldros lies far to the north of Primordia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0002
rows.name:
But you have to pass through Sylvalum to get there,
which I hear is nearly impossible unless you're a real
veteran.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0003
rows.name:
If you want to take the long way around,
you can apparently swim over there and climb ashore
on the western coast of Cauldros.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0004
rows.name:
If you're not sure you're up to the land route,
play it safe. What matters is getting you and
Hope back home in one piece.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0005
rows.name: Yes, I understand that it's urgent. I'm very sorry, but Hope isâ€”[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0006
rows.name:
Oh, thank God you're back!
How did it go? All well, I trust?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0007
rows.name: Yes.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0007_2
rows.name: Lularita seemed thrilled to have it resolved.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0008
rows.name: So thrilled that she decided to pay you a reward?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0009_m
rows.name:
Er, no. Though frankly,
it's my friend here who deserves the reward.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0009_f
rows.name:
Er, no. Though frankly,
it's my friend here who deserves the reward.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0010
rows.name:
Dammit, Hope. THIS is why our business
is always in the red, you know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0011
rows.name:
Anyway, some regulars dropped off a thank-you gift,
so you might as well take it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_JNK0010
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev092204_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell Ornella that it is very kind of her.

rows.label: qev092204_JNK0020
rows.name: Decline

rows.label: qev092204_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Ornella you can't accept it.

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0012
rows.name: At least you're smart enough to take a payment when offered.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0013
rows.name:
Oh, no. Not this again. One pro-bono worker
around here is enough. You're taking this and liking it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0014
rows.name: And there you go. Thanks again for helping Hope out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0015
rows.name: Um...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0015_2
rows.name:
I still don't feel like I've properly
repaid you for all you've done.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0016
rows.name: If you don't mind...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0016_2
rows.name:
Would it be okay if I helped you out
now and then with your work?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0017
rows.name:
Hope? I can't remember the last time
I heard you make a request like that![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0018
rows.name:
Anyway, maybe consider it?
You seem to be a good influence on her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_JNK0030
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev092204_SEL0031
rows.name:
Say that you'd love to have
Hope help out now and then.

rows.label: qev092204_JNK0040
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev092204_SEL0041
rows.name:
Ask Hope what will happen with
all the people coming to see her.

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0019
rows.name: Oh, thank you! I promise I'll do my best not to get in the way.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0020
rows.name:
That's why she has a plucky assistant.
I think I can hold down the fort for a little while.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0021
rows.name: Thank you, Ornella.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0022
rows.name: I'll be ready to join you whenever you need me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev092204_MSG0023
rows.name: Let's work to make the people of New LA a little bit happier![ST:wait ]
